name: Lolly: Surrounded by Men
description:
Hey! Our crazy game ‘Lolly: Surrounded by Men’ is already uploaded online and ready to play for every maniac of shooting. At the time, available is only “Survival” mode where you have to slaughter the largest possible number of males. I have to say, this project was made in two weeks for #wathtajam and now we are thinking about its future development. If the comments are positive, then we’ll do something bigger. :) Have a nice shooting!

Follow us here: https://www.facebook.com/devclawgames

#########################################

Controls:

A - move left,

D - move right,

Space - jump,

2x Space - double jump,

RMB - dash;

LMB - shot;

1,2,3,4,5 - Guns

Guns:

1. Pistols

2. Shotguns

3. SMG

4. Grenadelauncher

5. Nakur*iator

Credits:

Design & Art - Patryk Polewiak

Programming - Grzegorz Wal

Music - Draco Nared

www.draconared.com

www.devclaw.com
